# customcrud Provider

A provider that allows custom CRUD operations via subprocess calls.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    customcrud = {
      source = "registry.terraform.io/customcrud/customcrud"
    }
  }
}

provider "customcrud" {}
```
